flavorText: King or herder, the maggots care not.

foreignData.name: Aas
foreignData.text: Opfere eine Kreatur, um eine Anzahl an Maden-Spielsteinen in der Höhe der Stärke dieser Kreatur ins Spiel zu bringen. Behandle diese Spielsteine wie 0/1 schwarze Kreaturen.

name: Carrion
originalText: Sacrifice a creature: Put into play a number of Maggot tokens equal to the sacrificed creature's power. Treat these tokens as 0/1 black creatures.

rulings.text: You must sacrifice exactly one creature to cast this spell; you cannot cast it without sacrificing a creature, and you cannot sacrifice additional creatures.
Players can only respond once this spell has been cast and all its costs have been paid. No one can try to destroy the creature you sacrificed to prevent you from casting this spell.

text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Create X 0/1 black Insect creature tokens, where X is the sacrificed creature's power.
